content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #314

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 108

Submitted by @kensaku-kawamoto on behalf of @euvitudo from University of Utah

Chapter: Prefetch Template
Section: https://cds-hooks.org/specification/1.0/
Type: A-Q :question:
In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

The EHR may compute an efficient set of prefetch templates from multiple CDS Services, thereby reducing the number of network calls to a minimum

Comment:
What are the implications of this for a service wtihin this group? Will it receive more data than requested?

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #314

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 108

Submitted by @kensaku-kawamoto on behalf of @euvitudo from University of Utah

Chapter: Prefetch Template
Section: https://cds-hooks.org/specification/1.0/
Type: A-Q :question:
In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

The EHR may compute an efficient set of prefetch templates from multiple CDS Services, thereby reducing the number of network calls to a minimum

Comment:
What are the implications of this for a service wtihin this group? Will it receive more data than requested?

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #314

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
No, a service should not receive more data than is requests in prefetch. Prefetch optimization for multiple CDS Services will not cause unrequested data to be sent to the CDS Service.

We will update the spec to make this clear.

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #314

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment:
No, a service should not receive more data than is requests in prefetch. Prefetch optimization for multiple CDS Services will not cause unrequested data to be sent to the CDS Service.

We will update the spec to make this clear.

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
